name: Barcode1D
summary: A simple 1D barcode represented as an alternating sequence of bar/space segments.

methods.name: #ctor
methods.summary: Creates a new CodeGlyphX.Barcode1D from the provided segments.

parameters.name: segments
parameters.summary: Barcode segments in order (must contain at least one segment).

properties.name: Segments
properties.summary: Gets the barcode segments in order.

properties.name: TotalModules
properties.summary: Gets the total barcode width in modules (sum of CodeGlyphX.BarSegment.Modules for all segments).
